sources.note: Main website (Wix-based, rendered poorly for scraping). Tagline: 'DOX EMR / Starwriter Medical Data Collection'. Describes specialty-specific EMR with scheduling, patient portal, billing, and clinical modules.
ONC mandatory disclosures page. Wix site did not render content for automated extraction.
EMR & Clinical page. Wix content did not render, but search snippets indicate it describes clinical features, front office, patient portal, billing, and meaningful use.
Patient portal page. Wix content did not render for scraping.
Announcement page. Wix content did not render for scraping.
2.4/5 rating from 5 reviews. Features listed: clinical documentation, scheduling, billing, orthotics management, analytics. Cloud-based, multi-platform. Target: podiatry practices of all sizes.
Feature overview: chart notes, billing with CPT/ICD auto-pull, e-prescriptions, scheduling, patient portal, HL7 integration with CoveMD billing. Pricing ~$200/mo plus $5k-$15k upfront.
Zero reviews. Lists features: EMR with graphical UI, real-time data capture, billing integration, patient portal, scheduling, revenue cycle management, HL7 integration, multi-platform support.
DOX Podiatry EMR listing on MedicalRecords.com. Minimal content available from scrape.

Starwriter Research Solutions - Dr. Bart Ripperger's research consultancy. 18 years private practice, 11 years consulting with Starwriter medical data. Co-creator of patented clinical data collection process for HEOR, RWE, and decentralized clinical trials.
ZoomInfo company profile for DOX Podiatry. Headquarters: 8723 E Via De B Commercio Bldg, Scottsdale, AZ. Small team with Bart Ripperger as VP Business Development.
